eduversum.name: KVocTrain
eduversum.description: KVocTrain is a small tool which helps you learn vocabulary when you are trying to learn a foreign language. You can create your own data bank with the words you need. It serves as a substitute to flashcards. You probably remember using flashcards in school. You just put the card aside if you knew the translation. As a first step please load the "Examples file". This package is part of the official KDE Edutainment module.
